dmca.title: Subpoena Report
dmca.body:
My internet service is sbcis, Stating that they will release all my info to the plaintiffs because there is a law suit agaist ilegal recording going on. my ip is not listed ,but i dont want my ssn and stuff being able to be viewed by who ever. I need to file a motion to quash but not sure how to go about it.
                           sincerly yours Susan Cleaver
